title: cannot install over ssh a subdataset with space in its name

labels.name: fix-implemented
labels.description: A fix is available, but has not been merged or released, yet.

body:
```
hopa:/tmp
$> rm -rf testds*; datalad create --no-annex testds; datalad create -d testds "sub ds"; ls -l testds/sub\ ds -a 
[INFO   ] Creating a new git repo at /tmp/testds 
Created dataset at /tmp/testds.
[INFO   ] Creating a new annex repo at /tmp/testds/sub ds 
Created dataset at /tmp/testds/sub ds.                                                                                                                  
total 16
drwx------ 4 yoh yoh 4096 Apr  7 16:58 ./
drwx------ 5 yoh yoh 4096 Apr  7 16:58 ../
drwx------ 2 yoh yoh 4096 Apr  7 16:58 .datalad/
drwx------ 9 yoh yoh 4096 Apr  7 16:58 .git/

$> datalad install -r -s localhost:/tmp/testds testds-clone                                                                   
[INFO   ] Installing dataset at /tmp/testds-clone from localhost:/tmp/testds 
[INFO   ] Installing subdataset <Dataset path=/tmp/testds-clone/sub ds> 
[WARNING] Target /tmp/testds-clone/sub ds already exists and is not an installed dataset. Skipped. 
[ERROR  ] 'NoneType' object has no attribute 'get_active_branch' [utils.py:_install_subds_from_flexible_source:223] (AttributeError) 

$> datalad install -r -s /tmp/testds testds-clone-local           
[INFO   ] Installing dataset at /tmp/testds-clone-local from /tmp/testds 
[INFO   ] Installing subdataset <Dataset path=/tmp/testds-clone-local/sub ds> 
[INFO   ] Obtaining <Dataset path=/tmp/testds-clone-local/sub ds> underneath . recursively 
2 installed items are available at
<Dataset path=/tmp/testds-clone-local>
<Dataset path=/tmp/testds-clone-local/sub ds>
```

edit 1: issue remains in returnvalues branch where some fixes were implemented already
